text: Maxim Shlyakin is a Russian trampoline gymnast competing in tumbling and tumbling team events. In 2018 he won the gold medal in the tumbling team event at the 2018 European Trampoline Championships in Baku, Azerbaijan. In 2019 he won the silver medal in this event at the 2019 Trampoline World Championships in Tokyo, Japan. In 2017 he won the bronze medal in the men's tumbling event at the 2017 World Games held in Wrocław, Poland. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Russian male trampolinists Category:Medalists at the Trampoline Gymnastics World Championships Category:Competitors at the 2017 World Games Category:World Games bronze medalists
title: Maxim Shlyakin
